stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Sarasota, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Sarasota are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. Sarasota's affluent population and large retiree base makes strong consumer protections especially important.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Sarasota must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

faq.question: Where is your Sarasota cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Sarasota branch is located at 1645 South Tamiami Trail, Suite 210, right overlooking beautiful Sarasota Bay and close to the Ringling Museum. We're easy to access from US-41.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Sarasota location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. Walk-ins welcome!

faq.question: Is Sarasota a good place for retirement?
faq.answer: Yes! Sarasota is one of Florida's premier retirement destinations with excellent culture, beautiful beaches, and a rich arts scene. Many retirees choose Sarasota for its quality of life.

faq.question: Can I get a cash advance if I'm retired and on Social Security?
faq.answer: Yes! Social Security income counts as verifiable income. You'll just need to bring documentation of your Social Security payments along with your government-issued ID.

faq.question: What's special about Sarasota's location?
faq.answer: Our Tamiami Trail location puts you right on one of Florida's most scenic highways with views of the bay. We're surrounded by Sarasota's cultural attractions including the Ringling Museum and Van Wezel Hall.
